tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_information (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  preferred_language VARCHAR(50),
  preferred_category VARCHAR(50),
  subscription_status BOOLEAN,
  email_notifications BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  duration_minutes INT
);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE user_profiles ( profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users (user_id), full_name VARCHAR(100), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10) );
CREATE TABLE user_preferences ( user_id INT REFERENCES users (user_id), preference_key VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY, preference_value VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE marketing_messages ( message_id INT PRIMARY KEY, message_text VARCHAR(255), target_user_id INT REFERENCES users (user_id) );

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    marketing_emails BOOLEAN,
    marketing_sms BOOLEAN,
    marketing_push_notifications BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
